sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO attendance ( student_idx, attend_date, attend_in_time, attend_out_time, attend_division) VALUES (#student_idx#, default, default, default, #attend_division#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE attendance SET attend_date = #attend_date#, attend_in_time = #attend_in_time#, attend_out_time = #attend_out_time#, attend_division = #attend_division# WHERE student_idx = #student_idx#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM attendance WHERE student_idx = 500 AND (select attend_date from attendance where attend_date like #attend_date#) = #attend_date#
sqlMap.select: SELECT s.student_name FROM STUDENT s, ATTENDANCE a WHERE s.STUDENT_IDX = a.STUDENT_IDX
